sentences.sContent: "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs," the 1937 Disney classic, has lost none of its original charm.
sentences.sCn: 迪斯尼1937年的经典之作《白雪公主和七个小矮人》从未丧失其最初的魅力。

phrases.pCn: 效验如神地；异常成功地

remMethod.val: char(音似： 茶) ＋ m(看作man) → 被男士约出去喝茶， 因为很有魅力 → 魅力

words.tran: 超凡魅力的；神赐能力的
迷住；对…行魔法；哄诱（charm的过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 迷人的特性，魅力；符咒，咒文
trans.tranOther: Charm is the quality of being pleasant or attractive
to attract someone and make them like you, sometimes in order to make them do something for you
